title._content: William Alexander Spinks, Jr., ranch, Foothill Boulevard, Duarte, California. (LOC)

description._content: Johnston, Frances Benjamin,, 1864-1952,, photographer. [William Alexander Spinks, Jr., ranch, Foothill Boulevard, Duarte, California. Lily pool] [1917 spring] 1 photograph : glass lantern slide, hand-colored ; 3.25 x 4 in. Notes: Site History. Landscape: William Alexander Spinks, Jr., from 1908 after purchasing the ranch; K. Kobayashi superintendant.Today: Not extant. Slide used with lecture "California Gardens" as no. 27. On slide: Yellow-gold star sticker. Title, date, and subject information provided by Sam Watters, 2011. Forms part of: Garden and historic house lecture series in the Frances Benjamin Johnston Collection (Library of Congress). Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication. Repository: Library of Congress, Prints and Photographs Division, Washington, D.C. 20540 USA, hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.print Higher resolution image is available (Persistent URL): hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/ppmsca.16026 Call Number: LC-J717-X97- 27
